title: Make Me Prime Minister
overview: Apprentice-style challenge in which 12 Brits who think they have what it takes to run the country are put through a series of tasks designed to test their leadership skills, decision-making, resilience and integrity. The challenges are set and adjudicated by Alastair Campbell and Baroness Sayeeda Warsi. Can they find someone with the ability to succeed in the cut-throat world of politics?
